data.title: Vanessa Marcil Bio, Wiki, Net Worth, Boyfriend, Husband, Kids, Age
data.meta_description: Who is Vanessa Marcil? Know her bio, wiki, salary, & net worth, dating life, boyfriend, married, husband, spouse, age, height, & facts.
data.text:
Vanessa Marcil is an American actress. She is popular for her TV roles as Brenda Barrett on General Hospital, Gina Kincaid on Beverly Hills, 90210, and Sam Marquez on Las Vegas.

Vanessa Marcil was born in Indio, California, US in 1968. Her birthdate is October 15 and she is currently 54 years old. She is American and belongs to the white ethnicity. Her zodiac sign is Libra. Information, regarding her academic qualification is still unknown to the media.

Quick Wikis

Real Name Vanessa Marcil Birthday October 15, 1968 Birthplace Indio, California Zodiac Sign Libra Nationality American Ethnicity White Profession Actress Dating/Boyfriend MC Martin Married/Husband MC Martin (engaged) Net Worth $4 million Parents Peter Ortiz, and Patricia Marcil Ortiz Siblings Sherry, Sam, and Tina Ortiz

Vanessa Marcil Net Worth and Salary

Vanessa, before she landed in the role of Brenda Barrett on the soap opera, acted in several theatre productions. She began acting at the age of eight and performed original songs at her 6th-grade talent show. Vanessa appeared in the Prince music video ‘Poorgo’ on June 14, 1993, and “The Most Beautiful Girl in the World’ in 1994. She made her feature film debut in the 1996 film ‘The Rock’.

Vanessa is notable for the character roles Brenda Barrett, Gina Kincaid, and Sam Marquez on General Hospital, Beverly Hills 90210, and Las Vegas respectively. She gained three Daytime Emmy Award nominations for her roles and won an award in the year 2003 as Outstanding Supporting Actress. In February 1998, she was named Outstanding Lead Actress at the Soap Opera Digest Awards.

Vanessa is part of many movies; she is a brilliant actress and performs her character with immense love and affection. Her recent movie was Stranded in Paradise which was released in 2014, and in 2015 she was seen joining the cast of the Pop reality series Queens of Drama. In 2016, Vanessa starred in her latest Hallmark Channel movie, The Convenient Groom.

Vanessa is one of the most brilliant actresses the film industry has. As of 2023, Vanessa Marcil holds an estimated net worth of $4 million.

Previously Married Two Times

Vanessa was married to Corey Feldman (from 1989 to 1993) who is also an actor, but the pair separated after four years of marriage. On July 11, 2010, she got married to actor Carmine Giovinazzo in a private ceremony. The couple was expecting their first child together, but Vanessa had a miscarriage. She filed for divorce against Carmine in 2012, and it was finalized in 2013.

Vanessa and her former Beverly Hills, 90210 castmates Brian Austin Green have a son, Kassius Lijah. Kassius was born on March 30, 2002.

Dating her Boyfriend, MC Martin; Married?

Vanessa Marcil is currently dating her deputy sheriff boyfriend, MC Martin. His real name is still unknown, yet she refers to him as ‘MC.’

The pair started their relationship in April 2015. Moreover, a report also mentions that Vanessa already has an engagement ring on her finger.

On January 9, 2018, Vanessa announced that she was expecting a girl, but, she had a miscarriage for the seventh time.

Parents, Siblings, and Family

Vanessa was born to her parents, father Peter Ortiz, and mother, Patricia Marcil Ortiz. Therefore, there is no information about her parent’s occupations.

Vanessa has three siblings named Sherry, Sam, and Tina Ortiz. Regarding her brother and sisters, there is no information about them.

Vanessa Marcil Height and Weight

Vanessa is a beautiful woman; she has nice body features. She is decently tall with a height of 5 Feet 4 Inches and weighs about 56 kg. Vanessa has a partially dimpled smile. She has dark brown eyes with dark brown hair.
